ygData.subject: Re: Dyes
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info. You mean I need to LoY expansion to dye armor slots period right? There is no way to dye armor without buying LoY? I just want to make
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info. You mean I need to LoY expansion to dye armor
slots period right? There is no way to dye armor without buying LoY?
I just want to make sure before I go out and buy that expansion.
Thanks for all your help :)

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Randy" <morat68@y...> wrote:
> EQtraders.com is the best place to learn recipes for tradeskills.
> The Plains root and water flask combination will make Plains Dye.
> This is used for LoY tailored robes not to dye armor.
> If want you are wanting to do is change the color of visible armor
> on your toon, then here is what you need to do:
>
> First, you need the LoY expansion.(just a reminder)
> Now time to make some stuff:
> In a kiln put a Unfired Vial and a High Quality Firing Sheet
> the trivial on this is 54. (pottery skill)
> In a brew barrel or medicine bag combine a Prism Shard and
Glaze
> Lacquer, this is also trivial at 54. (brewing skill)
> You now will have a Dye Vial and Prismatic Dye, combine these
two
> items in a brew barrel or medicine bag. trivial at 68
>
> On your inventory screen there is a button that says dye. This is
> used to pick the color to dye your armor.
>
> Good Luck
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Enie" <dawn_marie@m...> wrote:
> > I have a question about dying my armor. Is there a website that
has
> > the dye recipes and the steps I need to take to make dyes? I
found
> > something on Allakazham but it just listed the components needed
> and
> > not what I need to do with them. I hunted in N. Karana to kill
> > beetles and get Plains Roots and put one at a time in a brewer
> along
> > with a water flask. I am up to 3 in brewing now LOL. But no dye.
Do
> I
> > need to be putting a bottle or empty flask in there too with the
> > other stuff? And does anybody know what color Plains Dye is?
Thanks
> > in advance for your help.
> >
> > Enie Menieminiemoe 31 Erudite Enchantress
> > Lamorie Sabreblade 22 Barbarian Warrior
> > Lilmomma Layofhands 22 Halfling Cleric
> > Lorlei Kissofdeath 20 Human Shadow Knight
> > Onehomelysista 5 Ogre Shaman
